title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Military Structures in Southern Lebanon: An Inside Look at the Operation”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked a military structure and operational infrastructure of the Hezbollah terror organization in Lebanese territory.

Earlier today, fighter jets attacked a military structure used by the Hezbollah terror organization in the spacious Merovachin area in southern Lebanon. In addition, overnight, an operational infrastructure of the Hezbollah terror organization in the Mis El Jabal area in southern Lebanon was attacked by fighter jets.
Furthermore, the IDF attacked with artillery to remove threats in several areas in southern Lebanon.

Following alerts in the Margaliot area, a number of launches from Lebanese territory into Israeli territory were detected. The IDF attacked the launch sources with artillery.
As a result of the launches, two IDF soldiers were lightly injured and were evacuated for medical treatment at a hospital; their families were updated.

Attached are videos from the attacks: https://bit.ly/3SO2Qd1
